markdownRemark.html:
As a fan of the comics Batman - The concept of having a clown as the main antagonist is so cool and crazy for avid followers like me. The title of this post is one of Joker’s famous line..in one of my most favorite performances in a movie. But the question have been a theme lately as I’m often ask of it a lot (or a variation of the same question every now and then).

The answer to the question is complicated. I wonder how long this post will going to be..

Boredom. Realizing the value of mindfulness and stoicism in my life have taken me to a place to scrutinize my way of response to each information that my mind absorbs. That’s a long sneaky sentence but pretty much captures my point. I find true value in focused effort to improve instead of wasting time to unproductive habits. As I have said in one of my blog posts - small stuff matter.

Regret. This is an overlying theme to everything I do.

Health

Transcendence
